Song.title: Acquitted
Song.copyright: Â© 2011 Mercy / Vineyard Publishing | Jeremy Edwardson Music (Admin. by Music Services, Inc.) | (Admin. by Jeremy Edwardson) Jeremy Edwardson | Jeremy Riddle

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [A] History split by sacrifice [Asus] God's perfect Son gave up His life [F#m7] To ransom back the lost and damned [E] Paying the price justice demands
PRE-CHORUS: [D] As He was broken [C#m7] heaven was opened [Bm7] Our judgment lifted [E] our sins acquitted [D] His loving kindness [C#m] freely invites us [Bm7] Into the realms of gr[E]ace
Chorus: S[A]ing a new song sing of His goo[D]dness, sing of His goodness [F#m7]Sing of His won[E]derful l[D]ove [A]
Verse 2: [A] True love was shown true love defined [Asus] As He was scorned and crucified [F#m7] He tore the veil bridged the divide [E/B] Taking us from darkness to light
Chorus 2: S[A]ing a new song sing of His goo[D]dness, sing of His goodness [F#m7]Sing of His won[E]derful l[D]ove [A] S[A]ing a new song sing of His goo[D]dness, sing of His faithfulness [F#m7]Sing a new s[E]ong to the L[D]ord [A (last time)]
BRIDGE: Lift [A]up your voices with all creation Decl[D]are His goodness to every nation Rel[F#M7]ease the anthem of hea[E]ven here on ea[D]rth
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 history split by sacrifice gods perfect son gave up his life to ransom back the lost and damned paying the price justice demands prechorus as he was broken heaven was opened our judgment lifted our sins acquitted his loving kindness freely invites us into the realms of grace chorus sing a new song sing of his goodness sing of his goodness sing of his wonderful love verse 2 true love was shown true love defined as he was scorned and crucified he tore the veil bridged the divide taking us from darkness to light chorus 2 sing a new song sing of his goodness sing of his goodness sing of his wonderful love sing a new song sing of his goodness sing of his faithfulness sing a new song to the lord bridge lift up your voices with all creation declare his goodness to every nation release the anthem of heaven here on earth
